strapiPost.title: Say I Do To The 5th Annual Wedding Fair At The Apollo This Weekend
strapiPost.content:
The Apollo on Emma invites you to meet Northwest Arkansas's top wedding and event vendors during the 5th Annual Wedding Fair this Sunday, Jan 22, from 12-4p.

  • Save the date: Sample caterers, explore stunning reception set up's, sip some bubbly, taste test cake, and register to win up to $1500 towards a venue package. Honestly, even if you're not engaged, this sounds like a killer date idea.
  • RSVP: The event is free to attend, but you must register on Eventbrite. The first 50 guests will receive a swag bag filled with local merch.

Find more information and register HERE.
